a: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.
jekh: Amari mìsia: te das vast savorren, sathanesөe, te xatăren i lùmja thaj te den duma maśkar lenөe e źutipnaça e ćhibĕnqo

a: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
jekh: Amari mìsia: te organizisaras e lumjaqi informàcia thaj te keras lan akcesìbilo thaj utìlo sathanesөe
del avri katar e butăqo than
